original_text: He will have to give back everything that he owned. He will not enjoy the things that he has worked for. He will have to give back everything that he owned.
korean_text: 수고하여 얻은 것을 삼키지 못하고 돌려 주며 매매하여 얻은 재물로 즐거움을 삼지 못하리니

sentences.original_text: He will have to give back everything
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 모든 것을 돌려주어야 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: He will not enjoy the things
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 것들을 누리지 못할 것이다

sentences.original_text: He will have to give back everything
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 모든 것을 돌려주어야 할 것이다
